org.tiralab.particles

Interface Storage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayStorage, DirectStorage, TreeStorage

    public interface Storage
    The acceleration structure.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addParticle(Particle particle)
      Signal for telling the storage object that the model created new particle.
      Rectangle[] getDebugRectangle()
      Get rectangles that visualizes the data structure.
      int getMemoryConsumption()
      Approximate memory consumption in bytes.
      Particle getObjectAtPoint(float x, float y)
      Get the nearest particle that is to point (x, y).
      Particle[] getObjectsAtArea(float x, float y, float w, float h)
      Get at least all the particles that are intersecting the rectangle(x,y,w,h).
      void removeParticle(Particle particle)
      Signal for telling the storage object that the model removed a particle.
      void setModel(Model model)
      Set model of storage.
      void updateParticles()
      Signal for requesting the storage object to update all particles loctations.

    • Method Detail

      • getObjectsAtArea

        Particle[] getObjectsAtArea(float x,
                          float y,
                          float w,
                          float h)
        Get at least all the particles that are intersecting the rectangle(x,y,w,h).
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the rectangle
        y - The y coordinate of the rectangle
        w - The width of the rectangle
        h - The height of the rectangle
        Returns:
        Gives particles that are inside the rectangle.

      • getObjectAtPoint

        Particle getObjectAtPoint(float x,
                        float y)
        Get the nearest particle that is to point (x, y).
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the point
        y - The y coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        Gives the nearest particle.

      • setModel

        void setModel(Model model)
        Set model of storage. The model is needed for getting all particles.
        Parameters:
        model - The new model for the storage.

      • getMemoryConsumption

        int getMemoryConsumption()
        Approximate memory consumption in bytes.
        Returns:
        Memory usage in bytes.

      • getDebugRectangle

        Rectangle[] getDebugRectangle()
        Get rectangles that visualizes the data structure.
        Returns:
        The array of rectangles.

      • addParticle

        void addParticle(Particle particle)
        Signal for telling the storage object that the model created new particle.
        Parameters:
        particle - The new particle.

      • removeParticle

        void removeParticle(Particle particle)
        Signal for telling the storage object that the model removed a particle.
        Parameters:
        particle - The remoded particle.

      • updateParticles

        void updateParticles()
        Signal for requesting the storage object to update all particles loctations.
